You do not like the scenes of households? Avoid your half!
If you returned late last night, do you forgive!
Think: you have not forgotten her birthday, party, or something else?
The crazy love is not for today, retry your luck tomorrow.
Cloudless day, but without much sun either. Like it? Give her/his flowers
51? Like so ... The evenings too watered, you like it? Not your Sweetheart apparently, while two aspirins and go to bed!
Beautiful day on your marriage, but do not count on a great love from your love declaration.
69? Well ... Want a ole ole hug? This is the time you spend lavishly.
A board to complete this beautiful day as you started: romantic dinner and walk in love.
You love passionately? He (or she) also, so if you have not already done so, it is a day or never admit it.
If you have not yet applied (e) in marriage, take a deep breath and throw yourself into the water, it\'s time.
